io.sarl.lang.core

Class EarlyExitEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.core.Event
      • io.sarl.lang.core.EarlyExitEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public abstract class EarlyExitEvent
extends Event
    Event describing an early exit from a block of code when it is fired by a SARL action.
    Version:
    0.3.1 2016-02-01 18:34:02
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.lang
    Maven Artifact Id:

    • Constructor Detail

      • EarlyExitEvent

        public EarlyExitEvent()
        Constructs an EarlyExitEvent without source. The source must be set with Event.setSource(Address) by the creator of the event, or by the emitting mechanism, before sending the event on the event bus.

      • EarlyExitEvent

        public EarlyExitEvent(Address source)
        Constructs an EarlyExitEvent with a source.
        Parameters:
        source - - source of the event.
